ros_handler module

class ros_handler.RosHandler(node_name: str = 'rs1_gui_handler')[source]

Bases: object

Centralized ROS2 handler that manages all ROS topics in a single thread. This allows the pygame GUI to remain responsive while handling ROS communications.

call_teensy_connect(connect: bool)[source]

set_expected_drone_topics(num_drones: int, camera_types: list | None = None)[source]

Set expected drone topics without discovery. Args:

num_drones: Number of drones (1, 2, 3, etc.) camera_types: List of camera types per drone (default: [‘front’, ‘bottom’])
